metadata.synopsis: The player tries to read a bronze plaque at the foot of an unidentified statue.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Text is too faded. Doesn't tell me who was worshipped here.
0.context: NodeContext: Players with religious classes comment on the plaque.

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Time and the elements have left the plaque unreadable.*
1.context: NodeContext: Narrator describes an illegible plaque.
